whatIsIt.title: What is Secret Manager?
whatIsIt.content: Secret Manager is a secure management solution for your secrets, passwords, and other sensitive information. It allows you to store your confidential data safely and share it securely with your colleagues or friends.

howToUse.title: How does it work?
howToUse.content: To use Secret Manager, start by entering your confidential information in the designated field. Then, set a password, a validity period, and/or a usage limit according to your needs. Once these settings are configured, click on "Create a secret link" to generate a secure link. This link can be shared with your colleagues or friends, who will be able to access your content by clicking on the link and entering the password.
